statements: SELECT * FROM geothermal_energy_project_dashboard;
SELECT project_name, location FROM geothermal_energy_project_dashboard WHERE temperature > 100;
SELECT project_id, project_name, power_generated FROM geothermal_energy_project_dashboard WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT project_name, power_generated FROM geothermal_energy_project_dashboard ORDER BY power_generated DESC;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_energy_project_dashboard WHERE temperature BETWEEN 80 AND 120;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_energy_project_dashboard ORDER BY project_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT project_name, location, temperature FROM geothermal_energy_project_dashboard WHERE temperature > 150 ORDER BY temperature ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_name, location, power_generated FROM geothermal_energy_project_dashboard WHERE power_generated > 10000 ORDER BY power_generated DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, location, temperature, power_generated FROM geothermal_energy_project_dashboard WHERE temperature > 100 AND power_generated < 5000;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_energy_project_dashboard WHERE location = 'California' AND temperature BETWEEN 120 AND 180 ORDER BY temperature DESC LIMIT 6;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_energy_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, total_cost FROM geothermal_energy_projects WHERE status='Active';
SELECT project_name, end_date, status FROM geothermal_energy_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT project_name, total_cost, status FROM geothermal_energy_projects WHERE total_cost > 1000000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, total_cost, status FROM geothermal_energy_projects WHERE status IN ('Active', 'Pending') AND total_cost BETWEEN 500000 AND 2000000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, total_cost FROM geothermal_energy_projects WHERE total_cost > 100000 ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM geothermal_energy_projects WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT kpi_name, value, measurement_unit FROM kpis WHERE value >= 50 AND measurement_unit = 'MW' ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_energy_projects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, total_cost, status FROM geothermal_energy_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC, total_cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM project_details;
SELECT project_name, location FROM project_details WHERE start_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM kpi_data ORDER BY date_collected DESC;
SELECT project_id, AVG(kpi_value) AS avg_kpi FROM kpi_data GROUP BY project_id HAVING avg_kpi > 50;
SELECT project_name, team_members.member_name FROM project_details JOIN team_members ON project_details.project_id = team_members.project_id WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, location FROM project_details;
SELECT * FROM kpi_data WHERE project_id = 1 ORDER BY date_collected DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_details WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_value FROM kpi_data WHERE date_collected >= '2022-01-01' AND date_collected <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT member_name, team_id, role FROM team_members WHERE project_id = 2 ORDER BY role DESC, member_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Project WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT project_name, location FROM Project ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM KPI WHERE target_value > 1000;
SELECT project_name, kpi_name, value FROM ProjectKPI INNER JOIN KPI ON ProjectKPI.kpi_id = KPI.kpi_id;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Project;
SELECT kpi_name, target_value FROM KPI ORDER BY kpi_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, location FROM Project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT project_id, kpi_id, value FROM ProjectKPI WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY project_id DESC;

SELECT pd.data_id, pd.project_id, p.project_name, k.kpi_name, pd.value, pd.timestamp FROM MonitoringData pd JOIN Project p ON pd.project_id = p.project_id JOIN KPI k ON pd.kpi_id = k.kpi_id ORDER BY pd.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project WHERE project_location = 'New York';
SELECT kpi_name, target_value, actual_value FROM KPIs WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_size FROM Team WHERE team_size > 5;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM Reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project
SELECT task_name, task_description, deadline FROM Tasks WHERE completed = FALSE
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_size FROM Team ORDER BY team_size DESC
SELECT kpi_name, target_value, actual_value, last_updated FROM KPIs WHERE actual_value > target_value
SELECT report_name, report_date, report_content FROM Reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01'
